Travelog

Pigeon Point Lighthouse

 Saturday, February 23, 2019
Pigeon Point Lighthouse, California—

On a Feburary weekend, I visited Pigeon Point Lighthouse south of Bay area. It is an ideal place to propose. Note: it is better to visit in the morning near sunrise.

Wildflowers encountered on my way to the lighthouse, 37°24'41.1"N 122°25'22.2"W

Also tried long exposure for the first time!

Pigeon Point Lighthouse, California

Point Reyes

 Sunday, February 3, 2019
Point Reyes, California—

On a Feburary weekend, I visited Point Reyes north of San Francisco.

Chimney Rock Trail

Cypress Tree Tunnel

It was raining lightly that day. I saw five or six rainbows on my way back. It was rainbow Sunday!

Point Reyes, California

Half Moon Bay

 Tuesday, January 1, 2019
Half Moon Bay, California—

On New Year’s Day in 2019, I went to Half Moon Bay to see sunset. It is beautiful.

Half Moon Bay, California

Muri Woods National Monument

 Saturday, December 29, 2018
Muri Woods National Monument, California—

During the Christmas holiday in 2018, I visited Muri Woods National Monument. Remember to reserve parking online!

Muri Woods National Monument, California

Big Sur

 Sunday, November 18, 2018
Big Sur, California—

I drove to Julia Pfeiffer Burns State Park. Here are the pictures along the California Highway 1.

Big Sur, California
